overview:
Mike is responsible for Radiumone’s sales and messaging to agencies and brand advertisers and will be an integral part in the company’s next phase of growth - the introduction of creative solutions that enable advertising agencies to effectively promote their brands in this new advertising medium.

In addition, he is charged with growing the company’s sales force throughout the United States and equipping it with the tools necessary to meet the company’s aggressive growth plans.Prior to joining RadiumOne, Mike served as VP of Sales and co-founder of BlueLithium, an industry pioneer in Behavioral Targeting. Mike built the BlueLithium sales team and was responsible for bringing in several large advertisers to help launch the company.

Prior to BlueLithium, Mike served as the Director of Sales at ClickAgents, where he had success building a sales team and bringing brand advertisers to the ad network fold for the first time. Mike brings over 10 years of online advertising industry experience to RadiumOne. He has handled strategic accounts, launched new products with advertisers, and built sales teams from the ground up. In the process, he has proven himself to be an accomplished manager, skilled in executing integrated sales programs.

Mike holds a BS degree in Political Science from University of California, Berkeley.
